snippet.title: Ford Street Racing XR Edition PS2 Gameplay HD (PCSX2)
snippet.description:
Ford Street Racing XR Edition PS2 Gameplay
Release Date: Mar 29, 2007 (AU)
Platforms: PlayStation 2, PlayStation Portable
_____________________________________________
PCSX2 Settings:
Renderer: OpenGL (Hardware)
Interlacing (F5): Auto
Texture Filtering: Bilinear (PS2)
Internal Resolution: 8x Native
Anisotropic Filtering: 16x
Mipmapping: Basic (Fast)
CRC Hack Level: Automatic (Default)
(✓) Allow 8-Bit Textures
_____________________________________________
(✓) Enable HW Hacks:
(✓) Half-pixel Offset: Special (Texture)
TC Offset X: 50
TC Offset Y: 0
_____________________________________________
My PC Specs:
CPU: Intel Core i7-4790K
GPU: GeForce GTX 1070
Ram: 16GB
OS: Microsoft Windows 10 Pro
_____________________________________________
Please leave a comment and rate it. :)
Enjoy !
